channel.title: CVE Feed for Kron -- Single Connect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kron -- Single Connect

item.title: CVE-2021-44794|2024-09-16T18:48:33.569Z -- kron -- single%20connect
item.description: Single Connect does not perform an authorization check when using the "sc-diagnostic-ui" module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access the device information page. The exploitation of this vulnerability might allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information.
